name: Jacob Jones
review: Placed an order at late night, received SMS says the order is ready for pickup at 9:40 AM in the morning the second day! Fantastic shopping experience at PB Tech.

name: Dianne Russell
review: Pb Tech is one of the best tech retailers I could ever recommend. Fast shipping and excellent prices. Well done!

name: Tom Wilson
review: Purchased some USB cables and a power pack online via PBTech website. Fairly easy to find what was available locally but could be better. Click and collect ready to pick up 1 hour after ordering. Very good.
